name: Lamb stuffed with Oysters
keywords: anchovy, lamb, oyster, dairy-free, nut-free, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 leg of lamb, boned (about 4 1/2 pounds) and butterflied

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix the bread crumbs, egg yolks, anchovies, onions, salt, pepper, thyme, savory, nutmeg and oysters. In the bowl of a food processor, mince the ingredients and slowly add the eggs to make a paste.
Spread oyster paste over the inside of the leg of lamb. Roll and tie the lamb, and bake 2 hours and 15 minutes, or until internal temperature is 150 degrees on meat thermometer.
